name: DeepSpace Shootout
description:
Take to the stars and battle your friends! Will you try to get the most points, or hunt down your friends mercilessly? 

Version History

1.0.3 - Fixed Joystick axes getting stuck sometimes
1.0.2 - Reduced screenshot lag
1.0.1 - Bug Fixes
1.0 - Initial release

Bug Reporting

Please report any issues at https://bitbucket.org/salianif...
Be sure to include as much information as possible.

Known Bugs

-Players sometimes respawn inside/very close to asteroids, causing them to take damage immediately
